text:
as a lifelong runner who's dealt with a lifetime's supply of injuries, it's time to take a different approach.

i'm excited to be joining nights & weekends s5 to get runaldo, a run training tool, up and running over the next six weeks.

cc:

user_info.description: Former TV producer building projects and products to improve how we travel. Also, running every rue in Paris (1.28% done).
